content: this chunky weight cowl is the perfect project for beginner knitters master the knit and purl stitches as well as pattern reading as you make your first project yarn 1 skein yarn twisters carter 140 yards/ 115g 80% superwash wool 20% nylon or any chunky weight yarn sample knit with colourway yt yellow gauge 14 sts by 20 row equal 4 by 4 in pattern in the round after blocking needles 8mm mm us 11 16 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge notions stitch marker darning needle finished size circumference 20 51cm height 7 18cm
